onboarding.title: Meet Iris
onboarding.description: Iris is an AI coding tutor built into Artemis. It has the current exercise and latest code context, so you can ask questions right away.
onboarding.note: Please note: Iris only supports course-related questions and does not engage in off-topic conversations.

step2.description: Iris can explain concepts, help locate errors, and offer hints, without giving away full answers.

step3.description: Return to Iris to complete the tour.

step4.title: Try a first question
step4.description: Choose a suggested prompt below to begin.

prompts.explainConceptStarter: Help me understand the concept of
prompts.quizTopicStarter: Generate 5 multiple choice questions to quiz me on the topic of
prompts.studyTipsStarter: Give me 3 tips to be effective at learning

settings.enableHelp: When enabled, Iris features will be available for all students in this course.
settings.customInstructionsPlaceholder: e.g., 'This course uses Python 3.12 and the pytest framework'
settings.customInstructionsHelp: Provide Iris with important context about your course content. This can include programming languages, frameworks, libraries, or other course-specific knowledge that helps Iris assist your students better.
settings.adminOnly: Only administrators can see and modify these settings.
settings.variantHelp: Select the AI pipeline variant to use for this course.
settings.rateLimitHelp: Leave both fields empty to use application defaults. Set 0 requests to block all Iris usage. Timeframe must be at least 1 hour.

rateLimitValidation.bothRequired: Both fields must be filled or both must be empty. Leave both empty to use application defaults.
rateLimitValidation.requestsNonNegative: Maximum requests must be 0 or greater (0 = no requests allowed).
rateLimitValidation.timeframePositive: Timeframe must be at least 1 hour.

error.noSettings: Unable to load settings. Please contact your administrator if this problem persists.

textExercise.title: Iris
textExercise.tooltip: Edit the Iris settings for this text exercise

programmingExercise.title: Iris
programmingExercise.tooltip: Edit the Iris settings for this programming exercise

lecture.title: Iris
lecture.tooltip: Edit the Iris settings for this lecture

course.title: Iris
course.tooltip: Edit the Iris settings for this course

proactivityBuildFailedEventEnabled.label: Monitor submission build failures
proactivityBuildFailedEventEnabled.tooltip: When enabled, Iris will proactively send help messages if a submission build fails.

proactivityProgressStalledEventEnabled.label: Monitor exercise performance progress
proactivityProgressStalledEventEnabled.tooltip: When enabled, Iris will proactively send help messages if the student's exercise performance does not improve.

proactivitySettings.title: Proactivity Settings
proactivitySettings.tooltip: Enable options below to allow Iris to proactively reach out to students when specific conditions are met.
proactivitySettings.parentDisabled: Iris won't send proactive messages for this option because either the option itself or Iris are disabled in the current or parent settings.

subSettings.rateLimitTooltip: The maximum number of answers a user can receive from the LLM in a given time period.
subSettings.rateLimitTimeframeHoursTooltip: The time period in which the rate limit applies in hours.

disabled.course: IRIS is disabled in course IRIS settings
disabled.global: IRIS is disabled in global IRIS settings

customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.description: Custom instructions to be provided to the AI when generating responses.
customInstructions.placeholder: Enter custom instructions for the AI (max 2048 characters)

settings.title: Iris Settings

error.forbidden: Artemis is not configured to use Iris. (Invalid token)
error.internalPyrisError: An internal error when communicating with the LLM occurred. Error message is: {{ pyrisErrorMessage }}.
error.invalidTemplate: The template is invalid. Error message is: {{ pyrisErrorMessage }}.
error.noVariantAvailable: Variant {{ variant }} is not available to use. Please contact your administrator if this problem persists.
error.noResponse: No response from Iris was received.
error.parseResponse: An error occurred while parsing the response from Iris. Cause: {{ cause }}

chat.helpOffer: How can I help you today?

ingestionAlert.lectureUnitSuccess: Lecture content processing in Iris has started
ingestionAlert.lectureUnitError: Error while sending lecture content to Iris
ingestionAlert.lectureSuccess: Lecture processing in Iris has started
ingestionAlert.lectureError: Error while sending lecture to Iris
ingestionAlert.allLecturesSuccess: All Lectures are now being processed
ingestionAlert.allFaqsSuccess: All Faq processing in Iris started successfully
ingestionAlert.allLecturesError: Error while sending all lectures to Iris
ingestionAlert.allFaqsError: Error while sending all Faqs to Iris
ingestionAlert.lectureNotFound: Could not send lecture to Iris, no lecture found with the provided id.
ingestionAlert.pyrisError: An error occurred while getting processing status from Iris.

controlCenter.tooltip: Enable or disable Iris for your course. To configure custom instructions, click the configure button.

chatHistory.title: Chats

relatedEntityTooltip.programmingExercise: This chat is related to a programming exercise.
relatedEntityTooltip.lecture: This chat is related to a lecture.

chatHistory.deleteSessionQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete the chat session "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

aboutIrisModal.subtitle: Your AI tutor, built right into Artemis.
aboutIrisModal.description: As part of the EduTelligence suite of AI features in Artemis, Iris helps with course-related programming questions and lecture content using your current context.
aboutIrisModal.contextAwareDesc: Iris can reference your problem statement, code, and build results, no copy-pasting needed.
aboutIrisModal.guidedLearningDesc: Iris provides hints and explanations to help you solve problems independently.
aboutIrisModal.feedbackHelpsDesc: Rate answers and conversations to improve Iris' quality over time.
aboutIrisModal.guideNotSolveDesc: Iris does not provide complete solutions. It supports your problem-solving process.
aboutIrisModal.stayOnTopicDesc: Iris answers questions about course content and programming topics only. It does not handle off-topic requests or organizational information.
aboutIrisModal.ownYourWorkDesc: Use Iris as a learning aid, while maintaining academic integrity. Your submissions must reflect your own understanding and effort.
aboutIrisModal.privacyDesc: Iris processes interactions within European data centers. Data handling follows applicable European data protection requirements.
aboutIrisModal.privacyDescLocal: Iris processes interactions entirely on your institution's own infrastructure. No data is sent to external servers.
aboutIrisModal.privacyDisclaimer: Review your institution's privacy policy for details.
